knimeNode.name: Numeric Scorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes certain statistics between the a numeric column's values and predicted values.

fullDescription.intro: This node computes certain statistics between the a numeric column's values and predicted values. It computes R², mean absolute error, mean squared error, root mean squared deviation, and mean signed difference. The computed values can be inspected in the node's view and/or further processed using the output table.
fullDescription.option: Column with the correct, observed, training data values.
Column with the modeled, predicted data values.
Change the default output column name.
The name of the column in the output.

ports.inPort: Table with predicted and reference numerical data

views.view: A table with the statistical measures
